name: cypresswithcucumberbdd-course
description: Projeto realizado seguindo o curso da Udemy "Cypress with Cucumber BDD - Automation Testing Bootcamp".

scripts.full-regression-tests-headed-chrome: cypress run --headed --browser chrome TAGS='@regression' && node cucumber-html-report.ts
scripts.full-regression-tests-headless-chrome: cypress run --headless --browser chrome TAGS='@regression' && node cucumber-html-report.ts
scripts.contact-us-tests-headed-chrome: cypress run -e TAGS="@contact-us" --headed --browser chrome && node cucumber-html-report.ts
scripts.contact-us-tests-headless-chrome: cypress run -e TAGS="@contact-us" --headless --browser chrome && node cucumber-html-report.ts

author: Eduardo Zirbell
